REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2521 reute r f BC-INFINITE-GRAPHICS-<IN 06-29 0073

TEXT.TITLE: INFINITE GRAPHICS <INFG.O> IN JOINT VEENTURE
TEXT.BODY: Infinite Graphics Inc said it signed a letter of intent to create a joint venture with <Computer Design Equipment Co> to expand sales of its computer-aided design equipment in the Midwest. Infinite Graphics said it will manage and hold the controlling interest in the venture, National CADD-Pro Upper Midwest. Computer Design has headquarters in Syracuse, Ind. Reuter
